title: Requires hospital to offer DNA testing of newborns or take blood samples from newborns for future
summary: Requires hospitals to provide parents of newborns with the option to have a DNA test performed on their child or have a blood sample taken from the child and preserved for future DNA testing.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring hospitals to provide DNA testing of newborns or take blood samples from newborns for future DNA testing
